name: 徐正會
objective:
1. Prerequisite: Mechanisms and Dynamics of Machinery (ME 3002013)
2. Course Objective: To provide the students with the relevant principles and application techniques about type synthesis and dimensional synthesis in the area of mechanism design
3. Text books: “Kinematics and Dynamics of Machinery” by Norton(東華，新月); “Kinematics, Dynamics, and Design of Machinery” by Waldron(歐亞)
Course Outline:
1. Introduction to the Creative Design,
2. Mechanical Members,
3. Creative Design Methodology,
4. Design Projects,
5. Linkage Synthesis,
6. Function Generation,
7. Path Generation,
8. Motion Generation,
9. Special Mechanisms.
schedule:
1. Moon Festival (no class)
2. Design Process and Creative Design
3. Mechanical Members and Joints
4. Engineering Creativity and its Characteristics
5. National Day (no class)
6. Kinematic Matrices and Atlas of Kinematic Chains
7. Specializing Algorithm and Specialized Chains
8. Generalizing Principles and Rules
9. Mid-term Exam.
10. Case Study: Motorcross Suspension Mecahnisms
11. Linkage Transformation and Types of Motion
12. Synthesis of Function Generators (Graphical Methods)
13. Synthesis of Path Generators (Graphical Methods)
14. Synthesis of Motion Generators (Graphical Methods)
15. Geneva Mechanisms and Straight-line Mechanisms
16. Case Study: Clamping Devices
17. Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam. 25%,
Final Exam. 25%,
Homeworks 20%,
Quizzes 15%,
Projects 15%
materials: “Kinematics and Dynamics of Machinery” by Norton(東華，新月); “Kinematics, Dynamics, and Design of Machinery” by Waldron(歐亞)
